ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 205

ygData.messageBody:
On fighting in Lavastorm:

Be very very careful if you are fighting near the entrance to Najena. This has
happened to me and a friend of mine. After being ambushed by 3 fire elementals
while looting my corpse (I just got all my armor, but my bags were on my
corpse) I ran to the zone to Najena because there was no way I was going to
live otherwise. Instead of zoning into the hallway where you're supposed to end
up, I ended up in a room full of Magicians and pets and was immediately killed.
I had to petition to get my corpse (which took 2 hours). The GM that helped me
was very nice and pulled my corpse out to safety for me. When this happened to
a friend of mine the GM's weren't quite so nice. They didn't believe that he
just zoned in to avoid a monster they believed he was "exploring" in Najena (at
level 12!). It took him 2 hours of arguing with a GM before he got his corpse
back. Both GM's mentioned that this does happen occasionally at that zone edge
(the second GM said my friend's corpse was on the wrong side of the room :( ).
I have no idea if or when they plan on fixing it. :(

Has this happened to anyone else?

Ezrae
Still level 14
Brell Serilis



Paul Jesernig wrote:

> From: "Paul Jesernig" <pwj@...>
>
> Solo hunting? Lavastorm is ok, you can hunt near Najena and zone if you have
> a problem. Don't know how much gear you have, as you hit the harder things
> you'll need a magic weapon. Yard trash in Unrest is also very good at this
> level, there's about 6 spawn spots inside the maze just past the fountains
> where you will be off the tracks. I think the regular aviaks (not the
> guards) in front of the Arena in Lake Rathe should be ok, though they may be
> too low. There's also a lizard man camp in Rathe Mountains (one outrunner
> and 2 in camp). The Southern Ro dervish camps have an outrunner at each that
> you can go back and forth between or join a group doing one of the camps
> (the east one is preferable, there's a safe area near the grass where you
> can pull to and no ghouls or dry bones will wander through). The solo dervs
> may spawn a little tough on occasion, but you can kite those using fear.
> Might be able to do the orc camp in misty thicket, not sure exactly how high
> they are, but level 10-12 I think. If you can get 4 or 5 people together,
> the orc camps in Rathe Mountains are great experience and loot. There's all
> my good spots (good as in loot, experience, and rarely occupied).
>
> Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
> > Message: 2
> > Date: Sun, 19 Dec 1999 18:00:28 -0600
> > From: "Richard Slater" <richie@...>
> > Subject: Hunting
> >
> > I am level 12 and looking for some good hunting grounds, I think I'm gunna
> > try lavastorm today so I'll see how that goes. But where was everyone's
> > favorite hunting grounds at level 12?
> >
> > ~ Skudd of Tarew Marr
> >
>
>
